item.title: Sony's high-resolution A7R V mirrorless camera now shoots 8K video
item.description: Sony’s high-resolution A7R V mirrorless camera now shoots 8K video Sony has launched the $3,900 A7R V, its latest mirrorless camera designed to shoot portraits, landscapes and other subjects that require as much resolution as possible.
